sentences.sContent: Without honesty, your best efforts to resolve conflicts will be wasted because you will not understand each other well enough to find mutually acceptable solutions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without honesty, your best efforts to resolve conflicts will be wasted because you will not understand each other well enough to find mutually acceptable solutions.
sentences.sCn: 没有诚实，就不能很充分很好地了解彼此以找到互相都能接受的解决方法也解决冲突的最大努力也将白费。

words.tran: [生态] 共栖，互利共生；互助论
